message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for someone in your position and can really optimize your process. I'm initially setting the price at $16,000. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, thanks for offering this product to me. I'm interested, but $16,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking something closer to $6,000 would be more reasonable. What do you think?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, $6,000 is significantly below its value.  Could you consider $13,000? I'm confident it will provide you with excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. $13,000 is still a bit high for my budget. Could we meet in the middle somewhere around $9,000?
Hi Bob, you're clearly serious about this product and I want to find a way for us to make this work.  How about we settle at $11,000? This is my final offer.
